post.summary: Add a player to the game
post.description:
Add a player to the game.
  • If the player is already in the game, then an error is triggered on /queue/errors.
  • If the game is full (too many players), then an error is also triggered on /queue/errors.
  • If the player has joined the game, then the event /topic/game/board/added is triggered with player and position information

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: Information required to identify a player (name and avatar)

/topic/game/board/added.description: When the player has joined the game

/queue/errors.description: If the game is full (too many players) or if the player has joined the game

post.description: Remove the current player from the game. Once the player is removed, the event /topic/game/board/removed. If the player wasn't really in the game, then no event will be triggered

/topic/game/board/removed.description: When the player was on the board and has sucessfully leaved

post.summary: Move the current player one cell up
post.description: Moves the current player one cell up. If the player can't move, then the player position is not changed and no event will be triggered. If the player can move, then the event /topic/game/board/moved is triggered with player and position information

post.summary: Move the current player one cell down
post.description: Moves the current player one cell down. If the player can't move, then the player position is not changed and no event will be triggered. If the player can move, then the event /topic/game/board/moved is triggered with player and position information

post.summary: Move the current player one cell left
post.description: Moves the current player one cell left. If the player can't move, then the player position is not changed and no event will be triggered. If the player can move, then the event /topic/game/board/moved is triggered with player and position information

post.summary: Move the current player one cell right
post.description: Moves the current player one cell right. If the player can't move, then the player position is not changed and no event will be triggered. If the player can move, then the event /topic/game/board/moved is triggered with player and position information

Execute an action. Please see specific actions to send: ChangePosition, ChangeStates, MoveImage, UpdateCurrentLife, UpdateMaxLife.

  • If the action is ChangePosition, then the event /topic/game/board/moved is triggered with player and position information.
  • If the action is ChangeStates, then the event /topic/game/player/states is triggered with player and the list of changes.
  • If the action is MoveImage, then the event /topic/game/action/image/moved indicating the image that moved and the position before and after.
  • If the action is UpdateCurrentLife or UpdateMaxLife, then one of the following events is triggered according to the life change:
    • /topic/game/player/died
    • /topic/game/player/revived
    • /topic/game/player/hit
    • /topic/game/player/healed.

parameters.name: change position
parameters.description: Change position of all players that are currently on the provided cell to another cell

parameters.name: change states
parameters.description: Change states of all players that are currently on the target cell

parameters.name: move image
parameters.description: Move an image on the board

parameters.name: update life
parameters.description: Update the current life of all players that are currently on the target cell

parameters.name: update max life
parameters.description: Update the maximum life of all players that are currently on the target cell

/topic/game/board/moved.description: When the ChangePosition action has moved at least one player

/topic/game/player/states.description: When the ChangeStates action has updated at least one state on one player

/topic/game/action/image/moved.description: When the MoveImage action has moved an image on the board

/topic/game/player/died.description: When UpdateCurrentLife or UpdateMaxLife has changed life of at least one player and his life is now under 0

/topic/game/player/revived.description: When UpdateCurrentLife or UpdateMaxLife has changed life of at least one player and his life was 0 and now its life is over 0

/topic/game/player/hit.description: When UpdateCurrentLife or UpdateMaxLife has changed life of at least one player and amount was negative

/topic/game/player/healed.description: When UpdateCurrentLife or UpdateMaxLife has changed life of at least one player and amount was positive

avatar.description: The name of a local image that will be displayed in the game for the player. Default value to 'default'

Player.description: The general information about one player. A player is either a real player (Wizard) or an enemy controlled by the server (Enemy)

@c.description: The type of the player: either a Wizard or an Enemy

id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific player

playerInfo.description: Information about the player (name and avatar)

amount.description: The life amount (positive means player was healed, negative means the player was hit)

change.description: The list of modifications applied to the player states

player.description: The player who states are changed

changes.description: The list of modifications applied to the player states

name.description: Image name to move. The name of the image represents the name of the local file to move.

Action.description: any of ChangePosition, MoveImage, UpdateCurrentLife, UpdateMaxLife, ChangeStates

@c.description: The type of the action: either '.ChangePosition', '.MoveImage', '.UpdateCurrentLife', '.UpdateMaxLife', '.ChangeStates'

ChangePosition.description: Change position of all players that are on the targeted cell (start) to another cell (end)

stateChanges.description: A list of changes to apply. Each change provide the name of the state and the action to apply on the provided state (add or remove)

ChangeStates.description: Change position of all players that are on the targeted cell (start) to another cell (end)

cell.description: The cell to target: the location of the game board cell where increment value should be applied

increment.description: The increment value to apply on the location. If increment is positive, then current life will be incremented. If increment is negative, then current life will be decremented.

UpdateCurrentlife.description: Change position of all players that are on the targeted cell (start) to another cell (end)

cell.description: The cell to target: the location of the game board cell where increment value should be applied

increment.description: The increment value to apply on the location. If increment is positive, then maximum life will be incremented. If increment is negative, then maximum life will be decremented.

UpdateMaxlife.description: Change position of all players that are on the targeted cell (start) to another cell (end)
